programme.title: Kitchen Whiz S7 - EP 19

programme.title: Belle & Sebastian - EP 25
programme.desc: When a courageous and wild young boy from the Alps befriends an exceptionally generous dog, that is shunned because of her enormous size, nobody can stop them from exploring every single peak of the valley together! Always on the lookout for adventure, Belle and Sebastian will rush to anybody's rescue, friend or foe, whatever the risk!

programme.title: Tobot S5 Part 2 - EP 21

programme.title: Knight And Day

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Gui Qiang apologises to Si Jin and asks her out for a meal, planning to confess with a gift. The two met Kai Wei's cousin, Qi Qi, on the way. Si Jin asked about Kai Wei, and learned that he had passed away in a car accident. Si Jin finds it unbelievable and insists that he must be her online friend who has constantly been encouraging her. Unable to hold back further, Gui Qiang then reveals himself as her online friend and that he had liked her all along! (PG)(重)贵强向思今道歉，约她一起吃饭，打算送上礼物向她表白。途中两人遇到凯威的表妹琦琦，思今向她打听凯威的消息，却得知凯威已经车祸身亡。思今难以置信，坚信神秘网友就是凯威，一直在身边鼓励她。贵强忍无可忍表明自己才是她的网友，一直喜欢着她！.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 108
programme.desc: (R) Mei Mei is unable to have a good night's rest after quarrelling with Da Ming. Jin Zhi and Shun Shui suggest she make peace with Da Ming. However, Mei Mei speculates that Da Ming has an affair and no longer loves her. Shun Feng tries to put in a good word for Da Ming, only to be reprimanded by Mei Mei. (PG)(重)媚媚因和达明斗气，一夜没好睡，金枝、顺水等劝她主动破冰，但媚媚却说一向都是达明来哄回她的，现在对她不理不睬，分明是因为在外面有了女人，所以才不再把她这黄脸婆放在眼里。顺风帮达明说话，却被媚媚骂了一顿。.

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. (重) 美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 乐学每疫刻 Learn Together With Me - EP 2
programme.desc: Andie Chen makes a guest appearance and discusses the perks of staying at home during this period. programme.title: 银色嘉年华 Silver Carnival - EP 3
programme.desc: In this episode, famous dim sum chef, Chef Vannes will demonstrate how to make beautiful and delicious taro mushroom buns. Chinese physician Guo Mei Ling will tell you good habits that can improve itchy skin (pruritus). Rogue lawyer Josephus Tan and his mother will continue to share their journey in life with us. Enjoy classic songs from Tang Lan Hua, Stella Chang, and Wen Zhang. 本集节目,点心界的厨王Chef Vannes将示范如何用最简单的方法做出美观又可口的芋泥冬菇包。听郭美伶医师告诉你, 生活中哪些好习惯能帮助改善或预防皮肤瘙痒.一曲《光阴的故事》道出流氓律师陈俊良的青春岁月。还有汤兰花,张清芳,文章带来的多首经典传唱好歌必能让你大饱耳福。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) A foreign worker who once helped Wei Ren fix his computer is moving house. Wei Ren and Ting Xuan offer to help him. While helping him, they start to develop some feelings for each other. As they come into physical contact, their hearts start beating quickly, and they suspect they have fallen for each other. Upon reaching home, they are unable to sleep well as the memories of them spending time with each other replay in their minds. (PG)(重)曾经帮为人修电脑的外籍劳工搬家，为人和庭萱来帮忙。过程中两人对彼此产生微妙的感觉，又因为有了肢体接触，内心不禁小鹿乱撞，怀疑自己爱上对方。回家后，两人都想起与对方相处的情景，辗转难眠。.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 11
programme.desc: (Part 2) When Kang Qiao gets pregnant, Martin mistakes that YT is the homewrecker. Angered, he wants to stop YT's reform plan. He calls Tang Ming up to YT...... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(第11集下)康桥怀有身孕，铭章误当逸滔是第三者，愤然要推倒他的医改阵营。他致电向唐明告密。。。。。。.

programme.title: 超级同学会 Super Reunion - EP 4
programme.desc: 《超级同学会》由从华视入学的“佼佼”黄子佼、“阿亮”卜学亮领军，将召开一场场充满欢笑、泪水、惊喜的同学会，对演艺圈如数家珍的两位大学长，将号召综艺王国、戏剧界以及音乐圈的同学们，为您献上经典男团女团、动人金曲、好久不见的大牌巨星，还有势必将再造另一股风潮的经典游戏 !

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 9
programme.desc: Xie Ying heads down for a meal and meets a troubled-looking Gui Qiang. She opened up the box of jewellery that Gui Qiang is holding, noticing that it was the bracelet that she had asked him to buy. Finding out that Gui Qiang had been rejected by the girl he likes, she makes fun of him, causing Gui Qiang to lose his temper and leave, leaving the bracelet behind. (PG)谢颖下楼吃饭，遇到心事重重的贵强，手里拿着首饰盒子。她好奇打开盒子来看，见是她之前叫贵强买的手链。谢颖得知贵强被喜欢的女人拒绝，有些幸灾乐祸地取笑他，贵强突然大发脾气，丢下手链径直离去。.

programme.title: 焦点 Focus - EP 3
programme.desc: This week on Focus: Life in Wuhan after 76 days of lockdown from the outside world; and Prime Minister had been transferred to the ICU, how will this impact Britain's fight against the virus? 同外界隔绝76天，看“解封” 后的武汉;首相也受到严重感染，谈英国疫情新发展。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 27
programme.desc: (R) Haotian gets conned by his investment partner. His wife, Suxian, discovers Haotian had stolen the money during the accident. Weixin fires Haotian for misappropriating company money. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)浩天被投资伙伴欺诈, 淑娴发现遗失的钱是自己老公浩天，大感失望。威信查知浩天盗用公司公款，把他开除.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 50
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 邻里合作社 United Neighbours Society - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) In each episode, we will zoom in on a residential estate where our two rival artistes will pit against each other to garner help from the residents to form their own "dream team". Each team will then embark on the task of decorating a 8 to 10 feet tall structure into an art piece within a given time. The winning art piece will then be decided by votes from MPs, arts professionals, as well as residents staying nearby. (重)(最后一集)两名主持人，各自找来一名〝达邻〞，帮忙在该区寻找10名组屋居民加入队伍。每队要在限时内以各种材料装饰一尊大型雕像。每集的雕像不一样，但都是一些可以代表新加坡的标志／物件，如狮子、椰树和胡姬花等。比赛结束后，该区居民、议员和美术专家们会进行投票，选出优胜队伍。节目宗旨：希望透过节目提倡睦邻精神、种族和谐及社区凝聚力，促进邻里彼此互动与了解。.

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The Philippines has the biggest Japanese community in Southeast Asia, with many arriving in the early 19th century. They bore the wrath of the locals after WWII, though this has dissipated through the years. Still, many have mixed feelings on their identity. Where do they truly belong? (重)19世纪初日本劳工的涌入，促使菲律宾达沃的麻蕉出口蓬勃发展，并成功蜕变成菲律宾最早现代化的城市之一。而菲律宾也是东南亚住有最多日本人的国家。多年以来，许多生活在菲律宾的日本后裔总是面对一种矛盾，他们是日本人，而菲律宾却是他们成长的地方，他们该如何自处？何去何从？上一代日本后裔背负着战争的枷锁，饱受主流社会的仇视，而新一代的日本后裔虽然没有了战争的包袱，却仍然必须在破碎的家庭中成长。这一集节目探讨生活在菲律宾的日本后裔的故事。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) One of China's greatest classical novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber" details the life and food of noble families. Host Danny Yeo visits Shanghai and Yangzhou to find a sumptuous feast inspired by this literature. (重)《红楼梦》可说是中国古代社会的一本百科全书，详细地描绘了当时贵族家庭的日常生活，也有许多关于美食的描述。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循古代名著的撰写，走访扬州与上海，寻找依据文字拼贴而出的一桌珍馐美味。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 30
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Daoxi sneaks into the mental institution to look for Na-yan. Once they meet up with each other, Daoxi exchanges attire with Na-yan and asks her to leave immediately. Moments later, a patient sets fire to the institution. Na-yan heads back to look for Daoxi, but Daoxi perishes due to her weak heart. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道希得知娜妍被关在精神病院里，于是潜进精神病院找娜妍。两姐妹相认后，道希跟娜妍对换衣服，并要娜妍赶到新星的身边去。不久后，有一病患在院内放火，本来已经离开医院的娜妍回头找道希，但道希心脏不好，在病房内逝世。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 16
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Haiying texts her cousin who will be getting married the next day in a family chat group and Haiying wants to catch the bouquet. She scandalises her chat group members by saying she'll bring Daojing to the wedding and Haiying's mother stomped into her room and scolded her, having read the whole message.Ep 24Daojing sees the vision of himself in a car accident and he has a feeling that he will die. He does not want to die with regret, so he proclaimed to Haiying that his love for he (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英在家庭聊天室发表了她在明天堂妹的婚礼上要接手花。 她还说她会把道京带去婚礼。看完整个简讯后，海英的妈妈冲到她的房间，教训了她一顿。Ep 24道京在视觉上看到自己在车祸中将死去。他不想感到后悔就向海英坦承自己对她的爱是百分百的，而且在死之前都不会离开她。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 45

Alternatively, Shina has to step down from her position and resume responsibility for all losses. Shina plans to push all the blame to Taizhu. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)正韩说YB的营运危机跟世娜脱不了关系，要YB出售YB城市减低亏损，或让世娜卸下职务，为所有损失负责。世娜为了保全她的利益，想把所过失都推到泰洙头上。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 46
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) On the day of the divorce proceedings, Emily presents Shina's DNA test result to the court. Emily says Shina is a dishonest and vicious person who tried to kill others to keep her secret safe, and thus she is not fit to be a mother. Shina loses custody rights of Song-er. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)离婚案第一天，艾蜜莉向法院提交世娜和胜赫的亲子鉴定鉴定报告，指世娜一直谎称是胜赫的女儿，为人不老实，另外还指世娜心肠狠毒，为了隐藏身份而买凶杀人，不配当母亲。世娜输掉监护权。.

Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. Ryan is pleased and confident the injury will cause Zack to lose an important MMA match, which he had placed a huge bet on the contender.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina makes her way to Phnom Penh, where the villagers live simply in ramshackle houses without water or electricity. Together with fellow volunteer, Fazli, she soon discovers that simple innovations and recycling methods can improve their living conditions bit by bit. She collects unused and half-used soap bars from hotel customers, and brings it over to an organisation that recycle them into new soap bars for the villagers. She also discovers how a simple pet bottle, water and a bit of bleach put through the zinc roofs of the houses can shine as brightly as any electrical bulb. Finally she joins some school children, whom she is impressed by how fast they pick up singing and dancing, and even paint a new mural for their school.

programme.desc: The concept of this culinary program where invited celebrities will bring their parents exploring all states in Malaysia to taste their parent's favorite food and try to cook for their parents.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Finland - EP 1
programme.desc: Among the world's richest nations, Finland is a top performer in numerous metrics of national performance, including education, economic competitiveness, civil liberties, quality of life, and human development. In recent years, the World Happiness Report has ranked Finland as the world's happiest country with its Nordic neighbors, Denmark, Norway and Iceland as runners-up.Since the late 20th century the number of Muslims in Finland has increased rapidly due to immigration. Nowadays, there ar Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping - EP 9
programme.desc: Han Yuzhuo gets injured while saving Hong Zhu from Jiang Daixi. Feeling guilty, Hong Zhu invites him to stay at her place so that she can take care of him during his recovery.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping - EP 10
programme.desc: National Shooter, Liu Xiujing is found dead in her house; Internet serviceman Du Herong becomes the prime suspect. Afraid of being arrested, Herong seeks help from Han Yuzhuo, his former roommate.

programme.title: Solo - EP 6
programme.desc: Host: Atyy MalekAty grew up listening to folktales and fables. She came across Chinese folklores that include songs, poetry and theatrical plays. Taiwanese for example, takes pride in their folklore and Aty is eager to hear more.

programme.title: Silang
programme.desc: Story about Amir, a graphic designer who recently married Dura. After their marriage, Dura realised that Amir had chronic dyslexia and that their son had the same problem.

programme.title: O.M.G - EP 5
programme.desc: O.M.G is a light-hearted drama about three boys who swopped bodies after an experiment gone wrong. Soon, the boys will learn about their friend's race, culture and tradition. To top it all, the boys have been nominated to participate in a Racial Harmony competition. Watch this programme to see if the boys get back their bodies and if they win the competition.

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 8
programme.desc: Host: Norfasarie'Di Hujung Pelangi' takes a look at the inspirational journeys of these special families who have learn to accept and embrace life's challenges by moving their lives forward in the most positive direction. Attention-Deficit-Hyperactivity Disorder (AD-HD) is a condition that can make it hard for a person to sit still, control behavior, and pay attention. These difficulties usually begin before the person is 7 years old. However, these behaviors may not be noticed until the child is older.There are three main signs, or symptoms, of AD-HD. They are- problems with paying attention, being very active (called hyperactivity), and acting before thinking (called impulsivity). In this episode we will feature a family with a child who has ADHD. The child was diagnosed with ADHD when he was at school-going age. Family share how he was diagnosed, the challenges before and after the diagnosis and how they have come up with ways to help him cope with school and at home.

programme.title: Helo Switzerland - EP 11
programme.desc: This Travelogue features host Ben Ali's exploration to several important destinations in Switzerland including the popular big cities, small towns and interesting locations in the outskirts. More interestingly, many adventure tips for budget travelers will be revealed to guide the audience.

programme.title: Hola Spain Bersama Keith Foo - EP 12
programme.desc: El Micalet a Clock Tower that is 167meter tall located in the old Valencia City that was built in the 17 Century. Nearby El Micalet is Santa Maria Church and La Lonja that was built in the 15th Century and recognized as World Heritage Building that have many Gothic and unique architectures. He learned to cook popular seafood dish name Paella. Science & Astronomy Museum and Oceanografic that featured two aquariums.

programme.title: A Week in Interviews
programme.desc: Highlights of some of the best Interviews over the past seven days.

programme.title: Keep on charting new terrain
programme.desc: The guys continue to find once-in-a-lifetime adventure on their journey through Uzbekistan. From attempting a heart-pounding new trick, to riding camels and sleeping in a yurt, the skate crew continue to find once-in-a-lifetime adventure on their journey through Uzbekistan.

programme.title: Naples
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe is your guide to the Italian city of Naples. Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes you on a tour of Italy's third largest city, Naples – the home of pizza and the capital of traditional Italian music. Join Hubertus as he explores Naples's art and culture.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe hits the city of Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in style as he explores the trendy city. Hubertus von Hohenlohe hits the city of Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in style as he explores a one-of-a-kind hotel room, tries the local cuisine, checks out a new neighbourhood and much more.

programme.title: Don't Crack Under Pressure
programme.desc: A team of extreme athletes embark on a quest to perform perilous feats in challenging conditions. Whether it's freeriding the steepest mountains, freediving the depths of the ocean or wingsuit flying over uncharted territory, the pressure for extreme athletes to perform is a force stronger than gravity. When the time comes, will they crumble?

programme.title: Crossing Corsica
programme.desc: Ultrarunner François d’Haene attempts to break the record for running the 180km GR20 trail. French ultrarunner and winemaker François d’Haene attempts to cross Corsica from north to south along the legendary 180km-long GR20 mountain trail in world record-breaking time – under 31 hours and 6 minutes.

programme.title: The road to Volcom Pipe Pro
programme.desc: In Hawaii, the two Volcom Houses prepare for Volcom Pipe Pro as the wind picks up. The Volcom Houses prepare for Volcom Pipe Pro as the wind picks up. As much as they can plan and prepare for the event, they can't control the Banzai Pipeline, Hawaii's legendary surf reef break.

programme.title: Final Preparations
programme.desc: With just 16 days left until The Baja 1000, the teams go through their numerous final preparations. With the start of the Baja 1000 just 16 days away, the teams go through their numerous final preparations. Race qualification, equipment readiness, sponsorship deals, must all be taken care of, not to mention time for mental preparation.

programme.title: Living Forever
programme.desc: American rapper GZA is on a quest to understand the age-old human desire to live forever. In his quest to understand the human desire to live forever, American rapper GZA finds out how bodies are stored in Arizona, visits a California lab studying the immortal hydra, and goes to Vermont’s transhumanist Terasem Foundation.

programme.title: Orlando von Einsiedel
programme.desc: See how film director Orlando von Einsiedel travelled the world to make Oscar-nominated documentaries. Learn how snowboarding took British film director Orlando von Einsiedel from dry slopes in London to going around the world to make several Oscar-nominated documentaries, and eventually to winning an Oscar himself.

programme.title: Danny Larsen
programme.desc: Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist. Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist – and what lesson he learned from snowboarding to dare the leap into creative arts.

programme.title: Eva Sandelgard
programme.desc: The Swedish freerider talks about the thrills of extreme snowboarding and dressing hair at Paris Fashion Week. Swedish Eve Sandelgard is a triple extreme snowboarding world champion and an haute couture hairdresser. Hear the story of her double life, from first female descents down Mont Blanc, France and Denali (Mt McKinley), Alaska to Paris Fashion Week.

programme.title: 24 hours with Kiddy Smile
programme.desc: With the release of his debut album, One Trick Pony, Kiddy Smile is set to take centre stage. Kiddy Smile is first and foremost a one-of-a-kind character. The performer plays around with his musical and physical identities, mixing genres and influences. With the release of his debut album, One Trick Pony, Kiddy is set to take centre stage.

programme.title: 4 Waves 1 Hour
programme.sub-title: The story of Mick Fanning's 2013 ASP title
programme.desc: A battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. The 2013 ASP World Championship was a battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning that all came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. Mick's journey to the title is narrated by the man himself in an intimate and dramatic look at his win.

programme.title: The Fog
programme.desc: Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody cross the salt flats into the heavy fog of Guerrero Negro, Mexico. After waking up in the gorgeous Scorpion Bay, Mexico, with some relaxing paddle boarding, Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody head through the salt flats to the lush oasis of San Ignacio, Belize, then into the deep fog of Guerrero Negro, Mexico.

programme.title: We Live It, Love It, and Pin It!
programme.desc: Leaving the foggy coast behind, Quinn Cody and Kendall Norman head into the Baja interior to ride sand dunes. Quinn Cody and Kendall Norman leave the foggy coast and head north into the hot and dry Baja interior, tearing up some sand dunes along the way. After navigating a dangerous route, the duo returns to the original roadside market where the trip began.

programme.title: Back to Business
programme.desc: Kendall Norman’s and Quinn Cody's epic adventure wraps up in time for them to defend their Baja 1000 titles. As their epic journey comes to a close, it's time for Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody to get back to business. The task at hand: defending their champion status in the legendary Baja 1000, a 1,000-mile nonstop race across the Baja California peninsula.

programme.title: Days of My Youth
programme.desc: Matchstick Productions' two-year project follows top skiers around the world chasing what they love: snow. The feeling of eternal youth that skiers get from doing what they love is the central theme of this two-year project from Matchstick Productions. Starring some of the most progressive skiers, this film shows the trials and triumphs of being the best.

programme.title: Bomba Beach
programme.desc: Two young hip-hop strutters travel to Puerto Rico to explore the bomba dance style and the culture around it. Hosts Niki Awandee and Niek Traa connect with Puerto Rican locals to become their students, learn about the bomba dance style and its culture, and integrate them into their own style. Will they be able to live up to their teachers’ expectations?

programme.title: A new season begins
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with motocross's top riders at the start of the 2019 season. As the 2019 MX campaign begins, there are contrasting fortunes for Jeffrey Herlings, Tom Vialle, Jorge Prado and Toni Cairoli. Find out how the season starts for each rider.

programme.title: Disc Golf and Slam Dunks
programme.desc: The snowboarding mates spend a day meeting the wildlife, playing disc golf, and racing vintage snowmobiles. When the weather doesn't cooperate for snowboarding, it's time to find other distractions. Jake and Roland spend a down day hanging out with some wolves, playing disc golf, riding old snowmobiles, and having a good-old fashioned Alaskan bonfire.
